h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Graceful Orchid Location
content: Graceful Orchid can be found at the end of Chen Loong's questline after giving him all 15 Seeds in the game within the Zodiac Realm in The New West. Our full page on the questline's initial steps will help you out. After you use the Ruyi Scroll") and enter the Zodiac Realm, you will then need to grab the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet, the Proto-Amourworm, and Rice-Cocoons") to be able to plant the seeds.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Graceful_Orchid.md', within the main section titled 'Graceful Orchid', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Graceful Orchid Location'.
The content is as follows:
Graceful Orchid can be found at the end of Chen Loong's questline after giving him all 15 Seeds in the game within the Zodiac Realm in The New West. Our full page on the questline's initial steps will help you out. After you use the Ruyi Scroll") and enter the Zodiac Realm, you will then need to grab the Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet, the Proto-Amourworm, and Rice-Cocoons") to be able to plant the seeds.
